lyrics:
10 contributorsvelvet lyricsintro
hm
oh aye aye aye aye
hey
mm oh oh
yeah yeah yeah yeah
yeah

verse 1
its cold outside why dont you come in
i know my walls are crumbling
its late at night and lately ive been alone
but that could be changing

prechorus 1
what you do to me conjures up feelings
ive never felt before and your company i adore
so deliciously gold and burgundy
sink into me i feel so warm

chorus
i feel you i taste you
the smoothest wine
like velvet cant help it
this loves divine
you might also likepostchorus
im ready to feel you
mmm im ready
you dont even know how ready i am
im feelin you its nice

verse 2
the moon is full the stars are aligned
i know just look into my eyes
its beautiful your skin against mine
i hope you let your mind take flight

prechorus 2
under velvet skies
lover we can fly away from the world
let all of our love unfurl
what a gorgeous ride
you dont have to hide a thing from me i am your girl

chorus
i feel you ooh i taste you ooh
the smoothest wine the smoothest wine im ready to feel you
like velvet cant help it
this loves divine
im ready to feel you
bridge
im ready to feel you
slowly we escape
our time we can take we can take we can take
im ready to feel you
feel you feel you feel you feel you feel

chorus
i feel you i taste you ready to feel you baby
feel you the smoothest wine
like velvet cant help it oh yeah so smooth so smooth
this loves divine
im ready to feel you

the smoothest wine its so smooth im ready to feel you
